title: FS: Rough but Tough T210 Chattanooga Card SOLD
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: FS: Rough but Tough T210 Chattanooga Card SOLD
posts.post_content: Hello everyone! Available for sale is a Tough Southern League Patterson from the Chattanooga Lookouts Team. Card ships well protected via USPS. Price is SOLD shipped. I would also trade for T206 Southern Leaguers. Please pm or message here with interest. Thank you!
Back scans are acting up. Please message me and I’ll send over better photo's. Reverse does have some issues for full disclosure. My apologies.
